ModMetaData.name: Sarcophagus = Table
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Sarcophagi function as tables. That is all. Safe to add/remove.
This description feels too short, so -
Pawns will eat at a sarcophagus if there are chairs next to it, just like they do with tables. A sarcophagus can be designated as a gathering spot, like a table can.
Update: Like tables, sarcophagi can now be reinstalled.
Mod was made in response to a suggestion on reddit.
